snippet.title: Why do we blink
snippet.description:
Why do we blink
4 Jan 2008 by goodhealthnyou on Goodhealthnyou's Weblog goodhealthnyou.wordpress.com/2008/01/04/body-48/
BLINK Blink means to make rapid, up and down movements of the eyelids. People blink their eyelids every few seconds to keep their eyes moistened with tears. … light or from smoke in the air. People also blink as a reflex action when …
